name: Nornir-buildmanager
tagline: Constructs 2D and 3D datasets from 2D image mosaics using the nornir tools
body:
### Welcome to Nornir
Nornir is a set of python packages to facilitate assembly of large image data sets.  These tools were originally designed to [construct] (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19855814) [3D connectomics volumes] (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21311605) from terabytes of image data for the [Marc lab] (http://marclab.org) at the University of Utah Moran Eye Center.

### Package overview

Construction of a volume is handled by the [nornir-buildmanager] (https://github.com/nornir/nornir-buildmanager/wiki).  This produces a set of images and transforms on disk which can be accessed via [Viking] (http://connectomes.utah.edu/), HTTP, or written as a stack of images.

Manual corrections of section-to-section alignment within a volume is handled by [Pyre] (https://github.com/jamesra/nornir-pyre/wiki)

Analysis of the annotations in our existing rabbit connectome and future connectomes is performed by the [py-connectome-analysis] (https://github.com/jamesra/py-connectome-analysis/wiki) package.

### Documentation

The [wiki] (http://github.com/nornir/nornir-buildmanager/wiki) contains documentation for installation and use
